metadata.name: Sunrise Over the Void #1/22
metadata.description:
[A multi-directional cityscape](https://infiniteobjects.com/products/cadaf-x-io-collection-untitled-xyz-sunrise-over-the-void). Scaffolding rises over each plane, seeking the memories of old construction. Volumetric oddities emerge through the passage of light. A new language, untethered to the nostalgia of slabs and staircases.

[CADAF x IO Collection](https://infiniteobjects.com/collections/cadaf-and-infinite-objects-intimate-visions): This collection brings together a leading group of artists who create a distinct visual language and representations of their surrounding space. Together, these artworks generate a universe of its own, from impossible architecture, visions of the sky, poetic notions, dreamlike landscapes and intimate objects. This collection invites viewers to experience and explore a modular universe inspired by art and technology. 

CADAF and Infinite Objects are proud to bring this special collection to life. All artworks will be available as an edition of 22, with physical and digital presence (Infinite Object Display + NFT).
